english.segment1: Fell in love at 22. With a girl that's close to you. Find a job and find a life. No more long days, longer nights. With your girl and family too. Playing card games in the room
english.segment2: This is our life, our old times..
english.segment3: Now that John is 42. With a family like you. With a job that led him down. Don't you know I led him round?
english.segment4: This is our life, our old times..
